member.name: M:RestFoundation.Configuration.DependencyBuilder.AllowPropertyInjection(System.Func{System.Type,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Enables property injection for the types that match the predicate. The predicate should include contract and implementation classes.
member.remarks: Use the type => true delegate to allow property injection to all types. This is not recommended since it can make the classes brittle if new public properties are defined.
member.returns: The dependency builder.

member.summary: Refers to a resource that is the subject of the link's context.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Alternate
member.summary: Refers to a substitute for this context.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Appendix
member.summary: Refers to an appendix.

member.summary: Refers to a collection of records, documents, or other materials of historical interest.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Author
member.summary: Refers to the context's author.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Bookmark
member.summary: Gives a permanent link to use for bookmarking purposes.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Canonical
member.summary: Designates the preferred version of a resource (the URI and its contents).

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Collection
member.summary: The target URI points to a resource which represents the collection resource for the context URI.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Contents
member.summary: Refers to a table of contents.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Copyright
member.summary: Refers to a copyright statement that applies to the link's context.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Current
member.summary: Refers to a resource containing the most recent item(s) in a collection of resources.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.DescribedBy
member.summary: Refers to a resource providing information about the link's context.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Describes
member.summary: The relationship A 'describes' B asserts that resource A provides a description of resource B. There are no constraints on the format or representation of either A or B, neither are there any further constraints on either resource. This link relation type is intended to be the inverse of the already existing 'describedby' relation type, thus allowing links to be established from the describing resource to the described resource.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Edit
member.summary: Refers to a resource that can be used to edit the link's context.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.First
member.summary: An URI that refers to the furthest preceding resource in a series of resources.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Glossary
member.summary: Refers to a glossary of terms.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Help
member.summary: Refers to context-sensitive help.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Icon
member.summary: Refers to an icon representing the link's context.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Index
member.summary: Refers to an index.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Item
member.summary: The target URI points to a resource that is a member of the collection represented by the context URI.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Last
member.summary: An IRI that refers to the furthest following resource in a series of resources.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.LatestVersion
member.summary: Points to a resource containing the latest (e.g., current) version of the context.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.License
member.summary: Refers to a license associated with this context.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Monitor
member.summary: Refers to a resource that can be used to monitor changes in an HTTP resource.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Next
member.summary: Indicates that the link's context is a part of a series, and that the next in the series is the link target.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.NextArchive
member.summary: Refers to the immediately following archive resource.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.NoFollow
member.summary: Indicates that the contexts original author or publisher does not endorse the link target.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.NoReferrer
member.summary: Indicates that no referrer information is to be leaked when following the link.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Payment
member.summary: Indicates a resource where payment is accepted.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.PreFetch
member.summary: Indicates that the link target should be preemptively cached.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Preview
member.summary: Refers to a resource that provides a preview of the link's context.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Previous
member.summary: Indicates that the link's context is a part of a series, and that the previous in the series is the link target.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.PreviousArchive
member.summary: Refers to the immediately preceding archive resource.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.PrivacyPolicy
member.summary: Refers to a Privacy Policy associated with the link's context.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Profile
member.summary: Identifying that a resource representation conforms to a certain profile, without affecting the non-profile semantics of the resource representation.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Related
member.summary: Identifies a related resource.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Search
member.summary: Refers to a resource that can be used to search through the link's context and related resources.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Section
member.summary: Refers to a section in a collection of resources.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Self
member.summary: Conveys an identifier for the link's context.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Service
member.summary: Indicates a URI that can be used to retrieve a service document.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.Start
member.summary: Refers to the first resource in a collection of resources.

member.summary: Refers to a stylesheet.

member.name: F:RestFoundation.LinkRelationValues.SubSection
member.summary: Refers to a resource serving as a subsection in a collection of resources.

member.summary: Refers to the Terms of Service associated with the link's context.

member.summary: Refers to a resource identifying the abstract semantic type the link's context is considered to be an instance of.

member.summary: Refers to a parent document in a hierarchy of documents.

The HTTP request data to validate.
An enumeration that represents the source of request data that is being validated. The following are possible values for the enumeration:QueryStringForm CookiesFilesRawUrlPathPathInfoHeaders

The key in the request collection of the item to validate. This parameter is optional. This parameter is used if the data to validate is obtained from a collection. If the data to validate is not from a collection, can be null.
When this method returns, indicates the zero-based starting point of the problematic or invalid text in the request collection. This parameter is passed uninitialized.

member.summary: Floating point numbers are parsed to .

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.FloatParseHandling.Decimal
member.summary: Floating point numbers are parsed to .

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.DateFormatHandling
member.summary: Specifies how dates are formatted when writing JSON text.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.DateFormatHandling.IsoDateFormat
member.summary: Dates are written in the ISO 8601 format, e.g. "2012-03-21T05:40Z".

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.DateFormatHandling.MicrosoftDateFormat
member.summary: Dates are written in the Microsoft JSON format, e.g. "\/Date(1198908717056)\/".

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.DateParseHandling
member.summary: Specifies how date formatted strings, e.g. "\/Date(1198908717056)\/" and "2012-03-21T05:40Z", are parsed when reading JSON text.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.DateParseHandling.None
member.summary: Date formatted strings are not parsed to a date type and are read as strings.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.DateParseHandling.DateTime
member.summary: Date formatted strings, e.g. "\/Date(1198908717056)\/" and "2012-03-21T05:40Z", are parsed to .

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.DateParseHandling.DateTimeOffset
member.summary: Date formatted strings, e.g. "\/Date(1198908717056)\/" and "2012-03-21T05:40Z", are parsed to .

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.DateTimeZoneHandling
member.summary: Specifies how to treat the time value when converting between string and .

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.DateTimeZoneHandling.Local
member.summary: Treat as local time. If the object represents a Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), it is converted to the local time.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.DateTimeZoneHandling.Utc
member.summary: Treat as a UTC. If the object represents a local time, it is converted to a UTC.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.DateTimeZoneHandling.Unspecified
member.summary: Treat as a local time if a is being converted to a string. If a string is being converted to , convert to a local time if a time zone is specified.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.DateTimeZoneHandling.RoundtripKind
member.summary: Time zone information should be preserved when converting.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.DefaultValueHandling
member.summary: Specifies default value handling options for the .

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.DefaultValueHandling.Include
member.summary: Include members where the member value is the same as the member's default value when serializing objects. Included members are written to JSON. Has no effect when deserializing.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.DefaultValueHandling.Ignore
member.summary: Ignore members where the member value is the same as the member's default value when serializing objects so that is is not written to JSON. This option will ignore all default values (e.g. null for objects and nullable typesl; 0 for integers, decimals and floating point numbers; and false for booleans). The default value ignored can be changed by placing the on the property.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.DefaultValueHandling.Populate
member.summary: Members with a default value but no JSON will be set to their default value when deserializing.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.DefaultValueHandling.IgnoreAndPopulate
member.summary: Ignore members where the member value is the same as the member's default value when serializing objects and sets members to their default value when deserializing.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.FloatFormatHandling
member.summary: Specifies float format handling options when writing special floating point numbers, e.g. , and with .

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.FloatFormatHandling.String
member.summary: Write special floating point values as strings in JSON, e.g. "NaN", "Infinity", "-Infinity".

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.FloatFormatHandling.Symbol
member.summary: Write special floating point values as symbols in JSON, e.g. NaN, Infinity, -Infinity. Note that this will produce non-valid JSON.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.FloatFormatHandling.DefaultValue
member.summary: Write special floating point values as the property's default value in JSON, e.g. 0.0 for a property, null for a property.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.Formatting
member.summary: Specifies formatting options for the .

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.Formatting.None
member.summary: No special formatting is applied. This is the default.

member.name: F:Newtonsoft.Json.Formatting.Indented
member.summary: Causes child objects to be indented according to the and settings.

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.IJsonLineInfo.LinePosition
